translated: Recitation Method of the Sutra of the Youth
Translated by Tripiṭaka Master Śubhakarasiṃha

original: □□□□天王白佛言。世尊若有女人。為小
analyzed: □□□□天王白佛言。世尊若有女人。為小
translated: The Heavenly King said to the Buddha, World-Honored One, if there are women🔽who wish to cultivate this method of the Sutra of the Youth for their young
children,
first on the eighth day and fifteenth day of the month,
they should observe the eight precepts.
Purely bathe.
Wear new clean clothes.
Pay homage to the Buddhas of the ten directions.
Rise at dawn.
Recite the mantra of the syllable la eight times over water,
and write the miscellaneous sutras of the youth in the inkstone.
Facing the east, make a circular altar.

original: 盛滿香花燈明閼伽等置壇上。
analyzed: 盛滿香花燈明閼伽等置壇上。
translated: Fill it with incense, flowers, lamps, water offerings, and so on, and place them on the altar.
After writing this sutra,
practice this method in a clean room.
If by the side of a river,
or by a mountain,
or in the dwelling place of monks and nuns,
practice the secret method of the Sutra of the Youth.
Make a circular altar four cubits in size.
Next, make the mandala drawing.
In the inner courtyard, write the name of the Great Brahma King.

original: 栴檀乾闥婆大鬼神□□□書十五鬼神形像。
analyzed: 栴檀乾闥婆大鬼神□□□書十五鬼神形像。
translated: Write the names of the fifteen ghosts and spirits, such as the sandalwood gandharva great ghost spirit.
After creating it as described,

original: 爾時大梵天王重白佛言。
analyzed: 爾時大梵天王重白佛言。
translated: At that time, the Great Brahma King again said to the Buddha,

original: 我為欲利養安樂閻浮提諸小兒故。
analyzed: 我為欲利養安樂閻浮提諸小兒故。
translated: In order to benefit and bring peace and joy to the children of Jambudvipa,

original: 唯願世尊聽許說最極密印陀羅尼。
analyzed: 唯願世尊聽許說最極密印陀羅尼。
translated: I only wish that the World-Honored One would allow me to speak the most secret mudra and dharani.
This dharani is as follows:

original: 多恎他阿伽羅伽寗那伽伽寗波漏隷伽婆隷婆隷不隷羅收禰修羅俾遮羅俾波陀尼波羅呵阿曷利沙尼那易禰那易蘇婆呵其印相。
analyzed: 多恎他阿伽羅伽寗那伽伽寗波漏隷伽婆隷婆隷不隷羅收禰修羅俾遮羅俾波陀尼波羅呵阿曷利沙尼那易禰那易蘇婆呵其印相。
translated: Tuihe agalaga qinnagaga qin poluli gapo li po li bu li luo shou ni xiu luo bi zhe luo bi po tuo ni po luo he a jiali sha ni na yi ni na yi su po he The mudra is as follows:
With the empty finger pinching the water fingernail,
Like the shape of picking a flower.
The wisdom fist presses the waist.

original: 若以此陀羅尼印加持病惱者。
analyzed: 若以此陀羅尼印加持病惱者。
translated: If this dharani mudra is used to empower the sick and afflicted,
They will be immediately cured.

original: 此陀羅尼被縛一切諸天。🔽一切大鬼神王。
analyzed: 此陀羅尼被縛一切諸天。 一切大鬼神王。
translated: This dhāraṇī binds all the devas.🔽All the great ghost kings.
All the great and small gods and spirits.
Only those with compassion are not bound.
All the ghost kings are bound.
Their heads will be smashed into seven pieces.
Like branches of the aśoka tree.

original: 爾時栴檀乾闥婆大鬼王。
analyzed: 爾時栴檀乾闥婆大鬼王。
translated: At that time, the great ghost king of the gandharvas, sandalwood,
And the fifteen great ghosts,
The gods and spirits,
All came and gathered, throwing themselves on the ground.
They said to the great Brahmā king,
We all abandon our evil minds.
We protect this dhāraṇī and the young boy.
We only pray that the great Brahmā king will speak the dhāraṇī.
And have all the ghosts and spirits protect the young boy.

original: 又護童子經除惡成吉祥。
analyzed: 又護童子經除惡成吉祥。
translated: And also protect the young boy's sūtra, removing evil and bringing auspiciousness.

original: 栴檀乾闥婆王即說陀羅尼曰。
analyzed: 栴檀乾闥婆王即說陀羅尼曰。
translated: The king of the sandalwood gandharvas then spoke the dhāraṇī, saying:

original: 曩莫三曼多沒馱引喃引一尾戌馱薩縛二合囉嚩引係係娑嚩二合賀內縛申水輪勿頭合是也。
analyzed: 曩莫三曼多沒馱引喃引一尾戌馱薩縛二合囉嚩引係係娑嚩二合賀內縛申水輪勿頭合是也。
translated: Namo samanta buddhānāṃ, viśuddha sarva pāpa vināyaka svāhā.
Recite the mudrā and dhāraṇī.
This mudrā and dhāraṇī
Eliminate all great epidemics
And remove all four hundred and four illnesses.

original: 一切鬼神常恒守護不離此人邊。
analyzed: 一切鬼神常恒守護不離此人邊。
translated: All ghosts and spirits always guard and never leave this person's side.
This mantra accomplishes all that is sought and is sacred.
I will also explain the fifteen ghost dhāraṇīs.
For the benefit of all sentient beings.

original: 唯願大梵王說十五眷屬陀羅尼。
analyzed: 唯願大梵王說十五眷屬陀羅尼。
translated: I only wish that the Great Brahma King will explain the fifteen retinue dhāraṇīs.
Then he said:

original: 南無佛陀耶一南無達麼耶二南無僧伽耶南無酬迦鬼彌迦王鬼騫陀王鬼阿波悉魔羅鬼牟致迦鬼魔致迦鬼閻彌迦鬼迦彌尼鬼梨婆坻鬼富多那鬼曼多難提鬼舍究尼鬼揵吒波尼尼鬼目佉曼荼鬼藍婆鬼莎呵大梵天王重白佛言。
analyzed: 南無佛陀耶一南無達麼耶二南無僧伽耶南無酬迦鬼彌迦王鬼騫陀王鬼阿波悉魔羅鬼牟致迦鬼魔致迦鬼閻彌迦鬼迦彌尼鬼梨婆坻鬼富多那鬼曼多難提鬼舍究尼鬼揵吒波尼尼鬼目佉曼荼鬼藍婆鬼莎呵大梵天王重白佛言。
translated: Homage to the Buddha! Homage to the Dharma! Homage to the Saṅgha! Homage to the ghosts of Qushi, Mijia, Qianta, Wang, Aposa Mo Luo, Mozhi Jia, Mozhi Jia, Yan Mijia, Jia Miniji, Li Po Di, Fu Duo Na, Man Duo Nan Ti, Sha Jiu Ni, Jian Zha Bo Ni Ni, Mo Qie Man Du, Lan Po! Svāhā! The Great Brahma Heaven King again addressed the Buddha, saying:

original: 有眾生於此陀羅尼能受持念誦。
analyzed: 有眾生於此陀羅尼能受持念誦。
translated: If there are sentient beings who can uphold and recite this dhāraṇī,
They will eliminate ten thousand evils and give rise to ten thousand wholesome deeds.
All the paths of darkness will always be guarded and protected.

original: 一切鬼神一切惡神慈悲加護。
analyzed: 一切鬼神一切惡神慈悲加護。
translated: All ghosts and spirits, all evil spirits, will be compassionate and provide protection.

original: 爾時大梵天帝釋天白佛言。
analyzed: 爾時大梵天帝釋天白佛言。
translated: At that time, the Great Brahma Heaven and Śakra Devānām-Indra addressed the Buddha, saying:
We have a dhāraṇī that protects all young boys,
Called the Dhāraṇī for Prolonging Life and Extending Lifespan.
It then spoke the dhāraṇī, saying:

original: 多恎他菩陀菩陀㝹摩帝菩提菩提摩隷式叉夜婆舍利婆多彌婆羅陀頭隷頭隷婆臈多頭隷舍摩膩收隷婆羅鞞陀波臈帝收藍舍彌帝般陀般絺婆呵膩摩祇摩膩陀波蘇可膩婆羅膩蘇波呵印相。
analyzed: 多恎他菩陀菩陀㝹摩帝菩提菩提摩隷式叉夜婆舍利婆多彌婆羅陀頭隷頭隷婆臈多頭隷舍摩膩收隷婆羅鞞陀波臈帝收藍舍彌帝般陀般絺婆呵膩摩祇摩膩陀波蘇可膩婆羅膩蘇波呵印相。
translated: Duota buda buda nu modi bodhi bodhi ma li shi cha ya ba sha li ba da mi ba la ta tou li tou li ba lao tou li sha mo ni shou li ba la pi tuo ba la di shou lan sha mi di pan da pan chi sha he ni mo ji mo ni tuo ba su ke ni ba la ni su ba he mudrā.
With both hands facing up, palms open.
Use the two thumbs to pinch the two ring fingers.
The index fingers come and go.
Recite this dhāraṇī and form this mudrā.
Always uphold the Sutra of the Youth.
It will extend one's lifespan by thirty-eight thousand days.

original: 此陀羅尼能消滅定業延壽命。
analyzed: 此陀羅尼能消滅定業延壽命。
translated: This dhāraṇī can eliminate fixed karma, extend one's lifespan,
destroy immeasurable evil, and give rise to immeasurable good.
It can accomplish one's wishes.

original: 次說勸請十五鬼神呪曰。
analyzed: 次說勸請十五鬼神呪曰。
translated: Next, the mantra of fifteen ghosts is spoken, saying:

original: 南摩三曼多勃馱喃一耽令令閻微枳履儞弭履訶娑難羅娑難特𭟒娑難𮉂莎呵印相。🔽二手二少指內相叉。
analyzed: 南摩三曼多勃馱喃一耽令令閻微枳履儞弭履訶娑難羅娑難特𭟒娑難𮉂莎呵印相。 二手二少指內相叉。
translated: Namo samanta buddhānāṃ dhenu dhenu yam vikṛtani mitri kṣānti kṣānti kṣānti svāhā. The mudrā:
Cross the two little fingers inside each other with the two thumbs touching.
The remaining four fingers are spread out and moved.
The mantra for summoning the fifteen ghosts and spirits:

original: 唵弭莫伽迦利沙野曳醯枳布瑟置迦鴦俱捨弱吽印相。
analyzed: 唵弭莫伽迦利沙野曳醯枳布瑟置迦鴦俱捨弱吽印相。
translated: Oṃ mimogakāriśaya yai kī puṣṭikā aṅkuśa jaḥ hūṃ. The mudrā:
Bend the five fingers of the right hand inward.

original: 三度召之是也。🔽次施食十五鬼神呪曰用金剛合掌。
analyzed: 三度召之是也。 次施食十五鬼神呪曰用金剛合掌。
translated: Summon three times.🔽Next, the mantra for offering food to the fifteen ghosts and spirits: Use the vajra-clasped palms.

original: 唵波羅步多二弭麼隷參皤嚩吽次說飽滿食十五鬼神呪曰。
analyzed: 唵波羅步多二弭麼隷參皤嚩吽次說飽滿食十五鬼神呪曰。
translated: Oṃ pāraṃpūta mimale saṃpūja hūṃ. Next, the mantra for the fifteen ghosts and spirits to be satisfied with the food:

original: 南麼三曼多勃馱喃唵訶利訶利藥乞叉尾儞夜達𭉮比旨比旨囉吒蘗囉藍蘗囉藍訶散難微訶上散難弱吽鑁斛印相。
analyzed: 南麼三曼多勃馱喃唵訶利訶利藥乞叉尾儞夜達𭉮比旨比旨囉吒蘗囉藍蘗囉藍訶散難微訶上散難弱吽鑁斛印相。
translated: Namo samanta buddhānāṃ oṃ hāri hāri yakṣa viṇayā dṛdhā bhidā bhidā raṭa pra laṃ pra laṃ haṃsaṃ haṃsaṃ hūṃ vaṃ huṃ. The mudrā:
The vajra palms are joined,

original: 以二大指捻二頭指甲上是也注云與願印也。
analyzed: 以二大指捻二頭指甲上是也注云與願印也。
translated: with the two thumbs pinching the tips of the two index fingers. Note: This is the same as the wish-granting mudrā.

original: 次說散粇米花曰用金剛掌。
analyzed: 次說散粇米花曰用金剛掌。
translated: Next, for scattering husked rice and flowers, use the vajra palms.

original: 唵摩訶摩儞布囉耶達羅達羅吽吽唵鉢囉嚩羅謁囉嚩底娑囉娑囉吽吽常白月一日八日十五日。
analyzed: 唵摩訶摩儞布囉耶達羅達羅吽吽唵鉢囉嚩羅謁囉嚩底娑囉娑囉吽吽常白月一日八日十五日。
translated: Oṃ mahā maṇi pūraya dhara dhara hūṃ hūṃ oṃ pravara ārya varadā sarasara hūṃ hūṃ. Always on the first, eighth, and fifteenth days of the bright month,
The constellation Ghost.

original: 設種種飲食菓子乳粥美味六種供養施神王。
analyzed: 設種種飲食菓子乳粥美味六種供養施神王。
translated: Prepare various foods, fruits, milk porridge, delicious flavors, and six kinds of offerings to give to the spirit kings.

original: 如是神等令一切眾生常惱害眾生坐生氣殺萬性人民。
analyzed: 如是神等令一切眾生常惱害眾生坐生氣殺萬性人民。
translated: In this way, may these spirits always cause harm to all sentient beings. The sitting spirit kills all kinds of people.

original: 一切眾生一切病皆此神王所為也。
analyzed: 一切眾生一切病皆此神王所為也。
translated: All illnesses of all sentient beings are caused by this spirit king.
Therefore, the fifteen spirit kings always think of and love them.

original: 持誦中我所說陀羅尼者得無盡壽命。
analyzed: 持誦中我所說陀羅尼者得無盡壽命。
translated: Those who recite the dhāraṇī I have spoken of will attain an endless lifespan.
All the heavenly kings will protect them.
All the spirit kings will always add protection.
With sandalwood and gandharvas,

original: 於一切閻浮提大鬼神中。
analyzed: 於一切閻浮提大鬼神中。
translated: Among all the great ghosts and spirits of Jambudvīpa,
They are the most venerable and supreme.
There is nothing above them.
Write the name and title of this ghost king,
And the dhāraṇī in the sūtra.
With five-colored thread,
Recite it one hundred and eight times.
If you recite it twenty-one times,
And recite it seven times again,
Tie it around the neck.

original: 又法小兒額書栴檀乾闥婆大鬼名號。
analyzed: 又法小兒額書栴檀乾闥婆大鬼名號。
translated: The method is to write the name and title of the great ghost Cendanta Gandharva on the forehead of a child.
The method is that if there are epidemics in the world,
Use the wood of a subdued ghost,
Recite it twenty-one times,
And have the patient drink it.
The method is that if there is an eye disease,
Recite flower water twenty-one times,
Drink it and wash with it.
Moreover, if there is a person with chest illness,

original: 以石留呪一百八返飲之。
analyzed: 以石留呪一百八返飲之。
translated: have them drink it after reciting the spell 108 times on a stone.
Moreover, if there is a person with hemorrhoids,
whether it is a red hemorrhoid or a downward hemorrhoid,
take a plant called ox knee,
recite the spell 108 times,
and have them drink it every day.
Moreover, if there is a person with a serious illness,
recite the spell on a large head and have them drink it.
The illness will then be cured.
Moreover, if there is a person with a head illness,
use a willow wood board,
recite the spell 21 times,
and place it under the head.
Moreover, if one wishes to subdue an evil person,
write their name,
give rise to an angry and evil mind,
shoot at the person's name with an arrow and bow once,

original: 而誦前十五鬼呪呼加彼名。
analyzed: 而誦前十五鬼呪呼加彼名。
translated: and recite the previous 15 ghost spells while calling their name.
They will die within three days.

original: 一切鳥類一切萬怪來集時。
analyzed: 一切鳥類一切萬怪來集時。
translated: When all kinds of birds and myriad strange creatures gather,
first make a strange gesture towards the object and recite the spell.
The strange creature will itself receive the strange affliction,
and will naturally die.
Although there are many dharmas in the fundamental canon,
they are not fully recorded.
The above is a note.
This Dharma eliminates ten thousand evils and accomplishes ten thousand wholesome deeds.
It causes all that is sought to be accomplished.
All worldly and transcendent blessings,
all lofty positions,
and all loving thoughts,
are all greatly auspicious.

original: 童子經念誦法壇上有惡字。
analyzed: 童子經念誦法壇上有惡字。
translated: The method of reciting the Sutra of the Youth has the character evil on the altar.
The character transforms into a pavilion of the seven treasures.
A canopy is spread above the pavilion.
Adorned with various treasures,

original: 其宮殿中有荷葉座座上有鉢羅字。
analyzed: 其宮殿中有荷葉座座上有鉢羅字。
translated: in the palace there is a lotus leaf seat with the character pātra on it.
It transforms into the Great Brahma King.
On the lotus leaf seat next to the king is the character vi,
which transforms into the great gandharva king sandalwood.
Next to the lotus leaf is the character hūṃ,
which becomes the fifteen ghost kings and generals.

original: 七萬八千鬼神前後圍匝。
analyzed: 七萬八千鬼神前後圍匝。
translated: Seventy-eight thousand ghosts and spirits surround them in front and back.
On the eighth day of the eighth month in the first year of Pingzhi.
Xingran
